text: Signs is a 2002 American science fiction horror movie. It is about an oncoming invasion of the Earth by aliens and of a family living in rural Pennsylvania preparing and barricading themselves inside their house against the aliens. It was shot in Pennsylvania and was directed by M. Night Shyamalan.
